Google Inc. 's newly-minted` Executive Chairman' Eric Schmidt to sell more than half million Google Inc. shares
Google Inc. 's Eric Schmidt , who is transitioning to executive chairman from chief executive, has plans to sell more than a half million company shares throughout the year as part of his asset-diversification plan, his first such sale in more than three years, Steve Jobs Russolillo reports for Dow Jones Newswires.`` The sales, worth about$ 335 million based on Google Inc. 's closing price Thursday, will lower Eric Schmidt 's stake and voting power, and comes as Google Inc.
